Context:
The WAVE Hearing Clinic offers free hearing tests conducted by students from their Hearing Instrument Specialist program. There is no charge for the hearing test and recommendation. Prices vary for hearing aid sales & service. Other services include a Hearing Conservation Consultation, which is also free of charge.

Contact information:
- Phone number: 416-415-2000
- TTY number: 1-877-515-5559
- Email address: ask.george@georgebrown.ca

Additional information:
- Sign up for college news, application deadlines, upcoming events, tours and more: Sign Up Now
- Download a copy of the WAVE brochure for a full listing of services and fees.
- Land acknowledgment page is available to learn more about it.
- The information on this website is subject to change without notice.

Services and fees:
- Hearing Test: No Charge
- Hearing Aid Evaluation and Recommendation: No Charge
- Hearing Aid Sales & Service: Prices Vary
- Hearing Conservation Consultation: No Charge
